author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Federation of All Trade and Industries Association (FATIA) has welcomed the permission granted for entry and exit of call taxis at the Railway Junction.

Meter system

At its executive committee meeting, the Association adopted a resolution to this effect and called for adherence to meter system by autorickshaws at least within the city limits.

The Association acknowledged the initiatives taken for establishing escalators and lifts in the Railway Junction and commended the Salem Railway Division for pursuing the budget proposal for a rail link between Coimbatore and Shirdi.

Other resolutions adopted at the meeting presided by Association president N. Sivanesan included conduct of consumer grievances redress meetings at block level, start of food park on Perundurai SIPCOT premises by the government, establishment of Integrated Agricultural Marketing Complex with NABARD funding, and start of cotton and yarn banks in Erode.
title: FATIA welcomes nod for call taxis in Erode Railway Junction
